title: Farm Woman
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Large, circular, with image of woman holding sheaf of wheat and sickle, standing at edge of wheat fields, birch trees right, flowers left. Glazes predominantly green, yellow, red, separated by cloisonne-like ridges
name: Plate
